name: vt-session
description: Represents a BACnet virtual terminal session, including local and remote session identifiers and the remote address.

fields.name: local-vt-session-id
fields.description: The identifier for the local VT session.

fields.name: remote-vt-session-id
fields.description: The identifier for the remote VT session.

fields.name: remote-vt-address
fields.description: The address of the remote VT session.
